      • DBMain

        public DBMain(java.lang.String h,
              java.lang.String u,
              java.lang.String p)
        creating a Database Class creates a connection to an SQLServer
        Parameters:
        h - the host address - could be a domain name or ip address (ex. "localhost/schema" or "192.168.1.15/schema")
        u - username of the user that has access to the database host
        p - password of the username.
